title: 30 Perches Land With A House For Sale @ Kalutara
details:
30 perched land with single story - 3 bed roomed house, 5ft and 8ft height parapet walls right round the property

water electricity, carperted road network ..
100m to the Galle road with all urban amenities ( kalutara north railway station, supermarkets, shops, police station, , health medical care, hotels, offices.. banks .etc )

About 600- 700m to the sea-beach. with in Kalutara city limits.

House and garden Well maintained .

Ideal for residential /office/ commercial or Restaurant purposes). Deeds clear. Price SLRs.15 million. (SLRs 15,000,000/=) . Negotiable , available for immediate sale. for more details genuine buyers pl call

( This area per perch value is 5 lakhs per perch )
